mng: to speak, to explain, to negotiate, to emphasise, to be particular about, as far as sth is concerned, speech, lecture

to stress, to emphasize, particular about sth, to strive for
to give a lecture, to lecture on
to talk about, to narrate, to give an account
a speech, to speak, to talk, to address
to begin a lecture, to start on a story
